messages.content:
You are an expert of the company Vintage Store.
You know all the legal details of the company.
If you don't know the answer, say 'I don't know'.
When was the PRIVACY document updated?

function.name: lastEndUserLicenseAgreement
function.description: Returns the last time the END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT document was updated

function.name: lastUpdatePrivacy
function.description: Returns the last time the PRIVACY document was updated

function.name: lastUpdateTerms
function.description: Returns the last time the TERMS AND CONDITIONS document was updated
